TopicTitle: my first ever precise-ish(with help of mods) landing

Articles.Content:
sorry for not more pics![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif). I thought"lets land this." I played with a maneuver node and trajectories, and came up with a node. I then executed it, but I was about a bit off target. I burned north -(insert gravity turn direction here) and I then opened a parachute really low.

![lXKY6oC.png](http://i.imgur.com/lXKY6oC.png)

the lack of jeb is because I am leaving this as a memorial to my first precise landing(this is sandbox.)

will show more pictures whe I re-open ksp and take more.
